entry.title: AtCoder Beginner Contest
entry.content: After I participated three AtCoder Beginner Contests(208,209,210), I found I can just solve three to four questions. I want to solve more, but I am thinking about how to do. Maybe I should learn more DP, tree, and graph, or I need to do much more practice.
entry.summary: After I participated three AtCoder Beginner Contests(208,209,210), I found I can just solve three to four questions. I want to solve more

entry.title: Summer Vacation
entry.content: Because of COVID-19, the beginning of summer vacation in Taiwan changed from 7/1 to 5/12. It sounded great to students. But it was terrible news to many parents. To me, it’s time for me to learn and practice more about programming techniques.
entry.summary: Because of COVID-19, the beginning of summer vacation in Taiwan changed from 7/1 to 5/12. It sounded great to students. But it was terrib
